channel.title: Hugo on Tom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Tom's Blog

item.title: My IndieWeb Journey: A Guide to POSSE on a Hugo Static Site
item.description: My journey of integrating IndieWeb principles into my Hugo blog-from microformats to Brid.gy syndication and building a custom Webmention renderer.

item.title: Digital Gardening
item.description: Treating your personal website like a garden you tend continuously, not as a finished construction, but rather cultivated, authentic fragmented of web.

item.title: How to add llms.txt to a Hugo Blog
item.description: Learn how to add an llms.txt file to your Hugo blog to make it more visible to AI agents and improve Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).

item.title: Crosspost Your Blog articles to Social Media
item.description: Learn how to automatically share your latest blog posts to Mastodon, Twitter/X, and other social networks using GitHub Actions and the crosspost tool. A simple way to regain traffic lost to search engines and AI.

item.title: Purge old Cloudflare Pages deployments
item.description: Learn how to automatically delete old Cloudflare Pages deployments using a Bash script and the Cloudflare API. Keep your account clean and reduce clutter by removing outdated deployments.

item.title: Optimizing Hugo Sitemaps to prioritize posts crawling over taxonomies
item.description: Learn how to optimize your Hugo site’s sitemap by adjusting priority and change frequency settings to improve SEO and guide search engine crawlers effectively.

item.title: Create a Virtual Bookshelf with Hugo and PaperMod
item.description: Learn how to create a virtual bookshelf on your Hugo site using the PaperMod theme, allowing you to organize and share your reading list with ease.

item.title: Automatically setting 'lastmod' in Hugo pages with Git modification date
item.description: Learn how to automatically set the ’lastmod’ parameter in Hugo pages using Git modification dates to improve SEO and expedite search engine indexing.

item.title: Monetize your blog with Ko-fi shortcodes for Hugo sites
item.description: Learn how to monetize your Hugo blog with custom Ko-fi shortcodes, allowing readers to support your work through voluntary contributions.

item.title: Optimizing Hugo static site redirects with Cloudflare Pages
item.description: Learn how to optimize Hugo static site redirects using Cloudflare Pages, overcoming limitations of GitHub Pages and Cloudflare Free plan.

item.title: Adding Mermaid diagrams to Hugo
item.description: Learn how to add and optimize Mermaid diagrams in Hugo, enhancing your static site with dynamic and interactive diagrams.

item.title: My pre-commit config for Hugo blog
item.description: Learn how to set up and use pre-commit hooks to automate tasks like linting, syntax checks, and optimizations for your Hugo blog.

item.title: Changing comments provider for my blog
item.description: Explore the process of switching comments provider for a Hugo blog, comparing Disqus, Utterances, and Giscus for better user engagement and ad-free experience.

item.title: Bye Bye Wordpress!
item.description: Learn about the transition from Wordpress to Hugo for managing a personal blog, including reasons for the switch and benefits of using a static site generator.

item.title: Checking for broken links on Your Website
item.description: Explore tools like wget, linkchecker, and linklint to efficiently find and fix broken links on your website, from small personal pages to large legacy platforms.
